query:
UPDATE workday
            SET total_hours = COALESCE($1, total_hours),
                comment = COALESCE($2, comment),
                is_editable = COALESCE($3, is_editable),
                edited_at = NOW()
            WHERE timesheet_id = $4
              AND date = $5
              AND deleted_at IS NULL
            RETURNING timesheet_id,
                      date,
                      total_hours,
                      comment,
                      is_editable,
                      created_at,
                      edited_at;
